ValidationRule.description: Credit Amount is required when Financial Disposition is Financial Invoice.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND ( ISPICKVAL ( Financial_Disposition__c , "Financial Invoice"), ISBLANK ( Credit_Amount__c ), ISPICKVAL ( Status , "Closed"), OR( RecordType.Name = "EDI Order", RecordType.Name = "Inquiry", RecordType.Name = "Inquiry (Internal)", RecordType.Name = "Order Claim", RecordType.Name = "Orders", RecordType.Name = "Quality Claim", RecordType.Name = "Third Party", RecordType.Name = "Changes" ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Credit Amount is required when Financial Disposition is Financial Invoice.
